Alleged stalker returns after judge dismisses case, sparking new complaints from women

HEATHER KNIGHT: A San Francisco judge notoriously dismissed the case of a man accused of stalking a teenager. Now, the man is back — and numerous women say he’s followed and grabbed them, too. The man admitted to The Chronicle he follows women he finds attractive, but denied getting physical.
